Class URLUtils

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.crawler.URLUtils
public final class URLUtils extends Object
Utility class for URL manipulations.

  • Method Details

    • getHost

      public static String getHost(String url) throws MalformedURLException
      Returns host part of the specified URL.
      Parameters:
      url - url to get host part for.
      Returns:
      host part of the provided URL or empty string if URL has no host part.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - if specified URL is invalid.

    • getURI

      public static URI getURI(String url) throws MalformedURLException
      Converts string representation of the URL to URI. Converted URI always has non-empty path. If original URL has empty path, the "/" path is used.
      Parameters:
      url - url to convert.
      Returns:
      converted URL.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - if specified URL is invalid.

    • removeFragment

      public static String removeFragment(String url)
      Removes fragment part of the URL.
      Parameters:
      url - url to remove fragment from.
      Returns:
      URL without fragment part

    • extractLinks

      public static List<String> extractLinks(URI url, InputStream is) throws IOException
      Extract links from the HTML document.
      Parameters:
      url - base URL for relative links.
      is - document stream.
      Returns:
      all links in the document.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurred during link extraction.
